articles.title: 8th inter-Korean ministerial talks open
DPRK government's stand to build world for children clarified
Greetings to Prime Minister of Morocco
articles.content:
Greetings to Prime Minister of Morocco 
    Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- Hong Song Nam, Premier of the DPRK cabinet, sent a message of greetings to Edris Jatto on his appointment as Prime Minister of Morocco.
 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Morocco would grow stronger in the interests of the two peoples, the message wished the prime minister great success in his responsible work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Enlarged plenary meeting of DPRK cabinet held

Sungryong Shrine
Juche in ideology
Kim Yong Nam meets south side's delegation to inter-Korean ministerial talks
Kim Yong Nam meets IFAD president
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam meets IFAD president
    Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and conversed in a friendly atmosphere with Lennart Bage, president of the International Fund for Agricultural Development, and his companion at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.
 Present there were Minister of Agriculture Kim Chang Sik and other officials concerned.    
 During my visit I saw the IFAD's assistance projects contributing to Koreans' efforts to recover from natural damage, he said, hoping that cooperative relations with the DPRK would be boosted.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok meets British political party delegation
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok meets British political party delegation
    Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the New Communist Party of Britain led by its chairman Alex Kempshall today.
 The chairman said he was well aware of the validity and vitality of the army-centred policy while touring various parts of the DPRK.    
 He said the delegation was deeply impressed to know that the army and people of the DPRK, true to the behest of President Kim Il Sung, are achieving great successes in the building of a powerful socialist nation, single-heartedly united under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il. We will wage a more vigorous solidarity movement for the development of friendly relations between Britain and the DPRK and Korean reunification in the future, he added.
